snippet: Howard was questioned, and the gun was seized by the airport authorities, who allowed him to board a later flight. The police said he would not be charged with a crime.
abstract: Houston Rockets center Dwight Howard is detained at a Houston airport when handgun is discovered in his carry-on luggage; catches later flight and will not be charged with crime.
lead_paragraph: Howard was questioned, and the gun was seized by the airport authorities, who allowed him to board a later flight. The police said he would not be charged with a crime.

headline.main: Rockets’ Dwight Howard Detained at Airport Over Gun
headline.print_headline: Rockets’ Howard Detained at Airport Over Gun
